mapper.insert:
select owner_seq.nextval from dual
insert into owner(owner_no, owner_id, owner_password, owner_name, owner_phone, owner_brn, owner_address, owner_mail, owner_startdate) values(#{ownerNo}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerPassword}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPhone}, #{ownerBrn}, #{ownerAddress}, #{ownerMail}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select owner_no from owner where owner_id=#{ownerId}
select count(*) from owner where owner_id=#{ownerId} and owner_password=#{ownerPassword}

select t2.* from(select rownum rnum, t1.* from (select owner_no, owner_id, owner_password, owner_name, owner_phone, owner_mail, owner_address, owner_brn, owner_startdate from owner order by owner_no desc)t1)t2 where rnum between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
